name: tronrelic-monorepo
description: Next-generation TronRelic platform monorepo implementing SPEC.md architecture.

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace apps/backend & npm run dev --workspace apps/frontend & wait
scripts.build:plugins: npm run build:plugin-backends && npm run build:plugin-frontends
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace packages/types && npm run build --workspace packages/shared && npm run build:plugins && npm run build --workspaces --if-present --workspace apps/backend --workspace apps/frontend
scripts.build:parallel: npm run build --workspace packages/types && npm run build --workspace packages/shared && npm run build:plugins && (npm run build --workspace apps/backend & npm run build --workspace apps/frontend & wait)
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d
